projects.Title: Delivery App
projects.Description: Delivery app is a mobile application designed to connect customers and delivery people.

projects.Title: Baztami
projects.Description: It is a mobile application for budget management.

projects.Title: Energy optimisation
projects.Description: Mobile platform for monitoring the consumption of energy produced by solar panels

projects.Title: PeopleBook
projects.Description: PeopleBook is a social network platform that allows you to chat with your friends and share new posts

projects.Title: Interactive menu
projects.Description: As its name suggests, it is a mobile application offering an interactive restaurant menu to the user allowing him to choose and compose his meals easily.

projects.Title: Personal website
projects.Description: My personal website. I tried to make it as sober as possible by applying the rules of digital sobriety.

projects.Title: NNG Navigacom
projects.Description: In this project, we worked with Navigacom consultants during 4 months on topics like Sustaible It, digital sobriety and ecodesign of digital services. Our missions consisted in preparing the content of sessions organized by Navigacom for the CIOs of large French digital and industrial companies.

projects.Title: VR memories
projects.Description: With the development of VR technology, virtual experiences perfectly simulate real experiences and, over time, it is difficult to identify the source of a given memory. This project set out to help the memory correctly identify the environment in which the memory occurred.

projects.Title: Nobel Prize Visualisation
projects.Description: A project to visualize the Nobel Prize winners from 1901 to 2016.

projects.Title: Tap-Tap
projects.Description: A mobile game to play music.

projects.Title: Konatus Project
projects.Description: Design interfaces to manage a company's schedule by project and by team.

projects.Title: Interactive mailbox
projects.Description: An interactive dashboard for visualizing your mailbox.

projects.Title: Climate change demonstration
projects.Description: Virtual experience demonstrating the impact of human activities on the environment.
